name: Hentai! GIRLS GIRLS GIRLS
description:
ALL CHARACTERS DEPICTED IN GAME AND ELSEWHERE ARE OVER THE AGE OF 18

Introduction

Hentai! GIRLS GIRLS GIRLS is a simple and relaxing puzzle game. Simply swap the puzzle slot to restore the pictures to their former glory.

Unwind from a long day and enjoy these girls, all here for you...

Features

  • New images constantly being added!
  • The further you progress, the more clothing gets removed...
  • Soothing Ambient Piano Music
  • Customizable Difficulty (Play as long or as little as you like!)
  • Use one hand to play when necessary
